short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist, productive UI for the YouTube website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube can be an excellent learning tool; however, elements such as the Home video feed and the recommended videos can be distracting. 

For those looking to maximize their learning and productivity, this extension will help you do just that.

This extension will:
- Hide the Home video feed
- Hide the Related video list that appears while watching a video
- Hide the comment section
- Hide the Explore section
- Hide the YouTube Shorts shortcut

Customizability and more features coming soon!
